form.label: Node List
form.searchTemplate: | inputlookup nodeinfo | `filter_contacts` | where isnull(DEL_TIME) | join max=0 type=outer tsmserver NODE_NAME [ | inputlookup scheduleinfo | join type=outer tsmserver NODE_NAME SCHEDULE_NAME [| `schedule_info`] ] | stats list(SCHEDULE_NAME) AS SCHEDULE_NAME list(status) AS status list(status_time) AS status_time list(last_completed) AS last_completed first(PLATFORM_NAME) AS PLATFORM_NAME first(CONTACT) AS CONTACT first(DOMAIN_NAME) AS DOMAIN_NAME first(USER_GROUP) AS USER_GROUP first(USER_SUBGROUP) AS USER_SUBGROUP by tsmserver NODE_NAME | eval status_time=strftime(status_time, "%F %T") | eval last_completed=strftime(last_completed, "%F %T") | fillnull value="" USER_GROUP USER_SUBGROUP | eval _raw=tsmserver+":"+NODE_NAME+":"+coalesce(CONTACT,"")+":"+coalesce(PLATFORM_NAME,"")+":"+coalesce(DOMAIN_NAME,"")+":"+coalesce(USER_GROUP,"")+":"+coalesce(USER_SUBGROUP,"")+":"+coalesce(mvjoin(SCHEDULE_NAME,","),"")+":"+coalesce(mvjoin(status,","),"") | rename tsmserver AS "TSM Server" NODE_NAME AS "Node Name" PLATFORM_NAME AS Platform CONTACT AS Contact DOMAIN_NAME AS Domain USER_GROUP AS Group USER_SUBGROUP AS Subgroup SCHEDULE_NAME AS Schedule status AS "Last Run" status_time AS "Last Run Time" last_completed AS "Last Successful Run" | search ( $filterString$ ) | table "TSM Server" "Node Name" Domain Platform Contact Group Subgroup Schedule "Last Run" "Last Run Time" "Last Successful Run" | sort "Node Name"

single.searchString: | inputlookup nodeinfo | `filter_contacts` | where isnull(DEL_TIME) | stats count AS total

td.p:
You can use the text field below to search for particular nodes. Arguments to the search command can be keywords or key/value expressions:
Terms: linux
Quoted phrases: "TDP MSExchg"
Boolean operators: CVI NOT (CVILONG OR CVIWEEK) AND ENGINEERING (boolean operators are case sensitive)
Wildcards: lxfs*
Field values: "TSM Server"=tsm613, Domain!=ORACLE, or "Last Successful Run"<"2014-01-01" (Field names are case sensitive, values are not)
Searches for Schedule, Last Run, Last Run Time or Last Successful Run must be done using field names: "Last Run"=Missed
